Molecules¶

MolConfig generators.

conformer_rl.molecule_generation.molecules.branched_alkane(num_atoms: int) → conformer_rl.config.mol_config.MolConfig¶

Generates a randomized branched alkane MolConfig, including constants for calculating Gibbs Score.

Parameters

num_atoms (int) – The number of atoms in the branched alkane.

conformer_rl.molecule_generation.molecules.straight_alkane(num_atoms: int) → conformer_rl.config.mol_config.MolConfig¶

Generates a straight alkane chain MolConfig, including constants for calculating Gibbs Score.

Parameters

num_atoms (int) – The number of atoms in the alkane.

conformer_rl.molecule_generation.molecules.lignin(num_monomers: int) → conformer_rl.config.mol_config.MolConfig¶

Generates a lignin MolConfig, including constants for calculating Gibbs Score.

Parameters

num_monomers (int) – Number of monomers in the lignin.

conformer_rl.molecule_generation.molecules.xorgate(gate_complexity: int, num_gates: int) → conformer_rl.config.mol_config.MolConfig¶

Generates a xorgate MolConfig.

An xorgate is a chain of alternating gates, where each gate is a chain of benzenes with a single carbon chail tail.

Parameters

  • gate_complexity (int) – Number of benzenes in each gate.

  • num_gates (int) – Number of gates in molecule.

conformer_rl.molecule_generation.molecules.test_alkane() → conformer_rl.config.mol_config.MolConfig¶

Generates a branched alkane MolConfig for testing.

conformer_rl.molecule_generation.molecules.mol_from_dict(input: dict) → conformer_rl.config.mol_config.MolConfig¶

Converts a dictionary into a MolConfig object.
